message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price just for you, Bob. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $125.
I understand, Alice. Let's try again. I'd like to offer $110 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm counteroffering at $135.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to offer $120 for the product.
